subject: Archive the plan
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Archive the plan after all tasks are complete:
- Create folder `ai-coding-harness-paper` in `./plans/completed`
- Rename the plan to a name befitting its contents
- Move it into `./plans/completed/ai-coding-harness-paper/`
- Read session IDs from `./plans/completed/ai-coding-harness-paper/`
- For each session ID, move `~/.claude/tasks/<session-id>` directory to `./plans/completed/ai-coding-harness-paper/tasks`
- Update any "in_progress" task to "completed"
- Commit changes
- Push changes to the PR

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `ls ./plans/completed/ai-coding-harness-paper/`
- expected: Plan file and tasks directory present
